S

sellItem(StoreItem, int) - Static method in class controller.StoreController
This method is used to make a request at the api to sell a item from the store
sellItemPage(StoreItem) - Static method in class controller.StoreController
This method is used to set SellItemPage as application's active page
SellPage - Class in views
SellPage is a view class responsible for creating the confirmation page for item selling
SellPage(StoreItem) - Constructor for class views.SellPage
Initializes the page with the item being sold
setActivePage(Page) - Static method in class controller.PageHandler
This method is used to set the active page of the application
setAddItemPage() - Static method in class controller.ItemController
This method is used to set AddItemPage as application's active page
setBillBtnDisabled(boolean) - Method in class views.MenuPage
This method is used to disable the button which leads to BillListPage
setBillPage() - Static method in class controller.BillController
This method is used to set the BillListPage as the application's active page
setButtonsAction() - Method in class views.MenuPage
This method is used to link menu buttons with their functionality
setDeleteBillPage(Bill) - Static method in class controller.BillController
This method is used to set DeleteBillPage as application's active page
setDeleteItemPage(StoreItem) - Static method in class controller.ItemController
This method is used to set DeleteItemPage as application's active page
setEditItemPage(StoreItem) - Static method in class controller.ItemController
This method is used to set EditItemPage as application's active page
setMenu(Page) - Static method in class controller.PageHandler
This method is used to set the menu page of the application
setStage(Stage) - Static method in class controller.PageHandler
This method is used to set the stage on which PageHandler can operate
setStoreBtnDisabled(boolean) - Method in class views.MenuPage
This method is used to disable the button which leads to StoreListPage
setStorePage() - Static method in class controller.StoreController
This method is used to set StoreListPage as application's active page
setTitle(String) - Method in class views.Page
This method is used to set the page title
show() - Static method in class controller.PageHandler
This method is used to display the current pages
shutdown() - Static method in class app.APIHandler
This method is used to execute the shutdown command on the api
start() - Static method in class app.APIHandler
This method is used to start the api and wait for it to fully initialize
start(Stage) - Method in class app.PresentationApp
 
stop() - Method in class app.PresentationApp
 
StoreController - Class in controller
StoreController is a controller class responsible for managing the view classes which operate with item and item related things.
StoreController() - Constructor for class controller.StoreController
 
StoreListPage - Class in views
StoreListPage is a view class responsible for creating and displaying the list of items from the store
StoreListPage(List<StoreItem>) - Constructor for class views.StoreListPage
Initializes the page with the items to be displayed
